title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Epic western open-world adventure with a gripping story, immersive world, and incredible attention to detail. Ride, shoot, and explore in the wild frontier.

title: GTA V
description: Crime, chaos, and open-world freedom. Experience the intertwining stories of three criminals in Los Santos while engaging in high-stakes heists and adventures.

title: Elden Ring
description: Dark fantasy action RPG set in the vast Lands Between. Explore a beautifully brutal world, face challenging bosses, and uncover deep lore and secrets.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Fight as a samurai in feudal Japan during the Mongol invasion. Master sword combat, stealth, and honor-based choices in an expansive and beautiful open world.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Futuristic open-world RPG shooter set in Night City. Customize your character, engage in high-tech combat, and explore a sprawling city full of intrigue and danger.
